code: @Test public void testNoDependsOn() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied().     // in this example the depends on bean is created first, and then the route builder, and CamelContext is started last.     long time1 = context.getRegistry().lookupByNameAndType("myDependsOnBean", MyDependsOnBean.class).getTime().     long time2 = context.getRegistry().lookupByNameAndType("myRouteBuilder", MyDependsOnRouteBuilder.class).getTime().     assertTrue("myDependsOnBean should be created before myRouteBuilder", time2 > time1). }
